title: Amentoflavone Enhances the Anti-tumor Activity of Regorafenib by Promoting Apoptosis and Inhibiting NF-ÎºB-mediated Metastasis in Hepatocellular Carcinoma.
abstract: Regorafenib is approved for advanced hepatocellular carcinoma (HCC), but its limited efficacy and resistance remain challenges. Amentoflavone, a natural biflavonoid, has shown anticancer activity in preclinical studies.
